General.Name: CATARC Automotive Proving Ground Co.Ltd.
General.Description: CATARC Automotive Proving Ground Co.,Ltd. offers automobile field testing services in China. The company builds an automobile field test environment and test scene. It also provides technical site test and tire testing services. The company serves automobile manufacturers, automobile testing institutions, automotive chassis component systems and tire companies, and other customers. CATARC Automotive Proving Ground Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Yancheng, China.
General.Address: 800 mts N. from the Xing of G228 & S332, Yancheng, China, 224100
